IWADs.Name: Freedoom
IWADs.Description: The Freedoom project aims to create a complete, free content first person shooter game, but Freedoom by itself is just the raw material for a game.

IWADs.Name: Blasphemer
IWADs.Description: Blasphemer aims to create a free content package for the Heretic engine, with a theme of metal-inspired dark fantasy.

IWADs.Name: Hacx
IWADs.Description: HACX is an action filled DOOM Engine game. The story is set in the near future, where you'll find yourself engrossed in an international blastfest. Wield weapons of mass destruction from China to Paris to combat a devilish artificial intelligence and its hordes of loyal fanatics. Can you handle it, hacker?

IWADs.Name: Chex Quest 3
IWADs.Description:
Chex Quest 3 is a free, family-friendly first-person shooter video game, developed as the third and final installment in the Chex Quest series. Originally released in 2008, it follows the same format as the earlier games, where players assume the role of a Chex Warrior tasked with defending the galaxy from evil alien creatures called Flemoids.

Set in colorful, cereal-themed environments, players use non-violent weapons like the Zorcher to "teleport" enemies away, rather than kill them. The game is a fun, quirky modification of the classic Doom engine, and it's known for its nostalgic appeal and unique marketing history, since the original Chex Quest was first introduced as a free CD-ROM inside boxes of Chex cereal in 1996.

IWADs.Name: Harmony
IWADs.Description: An independent game inspired by 3D shooters from the nineties like Duke Nukem 3D and Doom. Originally released in 2009.

Files.Name: Project Brutality
Files.Description: Project Brutality is a fast-paced gameplay mod that aims to amp up classic Doom like never before.
